Distribution. Transeurasiatic, temperate. From Kaliningradskaya Oblast to Primorye and Sakhalin Isl. Outside Russia : Europe, N Kazakhstan , Mongolia , NE and N China , Korea , Japan .
Hostplants: different deciduous and coniferous trees and shrubs, herbaceous plants.
